section.title: Data Item Values
section.para: Data Item Values belong to Data Items. Each Data Item Value represents a distinct value such as 'energyConsumption', or 'kgCO2PerkWh'.
Data Item Values themselves are rarely used, as all information in them normally appears in their parent Data Item.

tr.td: A 12-letter unique identifier for the data item. See for more information.
The time and date on which the item was created.
The time and date on which the item was last modified.
The current value for the Data Item.

section.title: Get Single Value
section.para: Fetches a representation of a single data item value.
The response contains a JSON or XML encoded description of the data item.
